name: AquaGone
description:
This is currently a prototype of my game for the 50th Ludum Dare Game Jam. The theme for this jam is Delay the Inevitable. For this game, full screen is highly recommended.

In this game, water is slowly rising around the island and you have to keep it from overtaking the entire island. If you hit the rising water, the game is over.

The goal of this game is to find sticks around the map and pick them up, and sell them in the pond at the top of the mountain. 1 stick sells for 1 coin, and you can buy super sponges which will automatically lower the water level surrounding the island for 2 coins per super sponge. Every time you use a sponge the water gets faster

Controls: 

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Shift to run

Space to jump

P to pick up sticks
